valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Mon 29 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Southeast Iceland 1002 expected 150 miles north of Faeroes 1007 by 1800 Sunday. Low south FitzRoy 997 expected Spain 1010 by same time

Trafalgar.text:
Wind
In south, cyclonic, mainly westerly or northwesterly 4 to 6, occasionally 3 in south and east. In north, cyclonic gale 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 at first.
Sea state
In south, rough or very rough, occasionally moderate at first in east. in north, rough or very rough, occasionally high at first.
Weather
Thundery rain then showers.
Visibility
In south, good, occasionally poor at first. In north, good, occasionally poor at first.
